mapper.insert: insert into t_role (ID, ROLE_NO, ROLE_NAME, MENU_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_role set ROLE_NO = #{roleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ROLE_NO, ROLE_NAME, MENU_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from t_role
